stand_out:
1. The project contains tests for Repository query methods backed by an in-memory H2 Database and embedded Mongo
2. The project uses its own JSON representation for REST instead of serializing the entities directly.
3. The project uses aggregations to calculate average rating for the product.

rubric_items.passed_description: All code is functional (i.e. no errors are thrown by the code). Warnings are okay, as long as they are not a result of poor coding practices.
The project uses functions and loops where possible to reduce repetitive code. Comments are used as needed to document code functionality.
rubric_items.criteria: Does the project follow good coding practices?

rubric_items.passed_description: The project contains the necessary SQL scripts to create review, comment and product tables.
rubric_items.criteria: The project demonstrates understanding of SQL DDL.

rubric_items.passed_description: The project contains the SQL to create foreign key constraints on review & comment tables. Review is related to Product. Comment is related to Review.
rubric_items.criteria: The project shows proper use of relational model constraints.

rubric_items.passed_description:
The project contains the following properties to properly connect to a relational database in Spring.
Spring.datasource.url, spring.datasource.username, spring.datasource.password
rubric_items.criteria: The project demonstrates understanding of connecting an application to a relational database.

rubric_items.passed_description: The project contains the JPA entities for Product, Review & Comment.
rubric_items.criteria: The project demonstrates understanding of JPA.

rubric_items.passed_description: The project contains JPA entities which use at least one of the available id generation strategies in JPA.
rubric_items.criteria: The project demonstrates understanding of primary key (id) generation in JPA.

rubric_items.passed_description: The project contains JPA entities which are connected using JPA collections.
rubric_items.criteria: The project shows proper use JPA data modeling.

rubric_items.passed_description: The project contains Spring Data JPA repositories for Product, Review & Comment entities.
rubric_items.criteria: The project demonstrates understanding of Spring Data JPA

rubric_items.passed_description:
The project contains Spring Data JPA repositories with methods following the query keywords and return types.

https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/jpa/docs/current/reference/html/#repository-query-keywords

https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/jpa/docs/current/reference/html/#repository-query-return-types
rubric_items.criteria: The project shows proper use Spring Data JPA Repository Query methods

rubric_items.passed_description: The project contains the correct methods wired in at the provided controllers in the starter code.
rubric_items.criteria: The project demonstrates usage of Spring Data JPA repositories.

rubric_items.passed_description: The project has tests for all the methods in the Spring Data JPA repositories
rubric_items.criteria: The project demonstrates usage Spring test framework.

rubric_items.passed_description: The project has tests for Spring Data JPA repositories that run against a H2 database.
rubric_items.criteria: The project shows proper use of H2 database for testing.

rubric_items.passed_description: The project contains a document for review nested with the comments inside.
rubric_items.criteria: The project demonstrates understanding of MongoDB document model.

rubric_items.passed_description:
The project contains Spring Data Mongo repositories with methods following the query keywords and return types.

https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/jpa/docs/current/reference/html/#repository-query-keywords

https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/jpa/docs/current/reference/html/#repository-query-return-types
rubric_items.criteria: The project shows proper use Spring Data MongoDB Repository Query methods.

rubric_items.passed_description: The project contains the correct methods wired in at the provided controllers in the starter code.
rubric_items.criteria: The project demonstrates usage of Spring Data MongoDB repositories.

rubric_items.passed_description: The project has tests for all the methods in the Spring Data MongoDB repositories.
rubric_items.criteria: The project demonstrates usage Spring test framework.

rubric_items.passed_description: The project has tests for Spring Data MongoDB repositories that run against an embedded mongo database.
rubric_items.criteria: The project shows proper use of embedded Mongo database for testing.

project.name: Data Store for Customer Reviews- Final
